projects.title: GitHub Finder
projects.description: This project is a Github profile application made with ReactJS using the GitHub API. It utilizes context hooks for state management

projects.title: Contact Manager
projects.description: A contact manager application utilizing ReactJS, useContext for state management, NodeJS, MongoDB, and Express

projects.title: IT-Logger
projects.description: Issue ticket logger that utilizes ReactJS, Node, Redux, Axios, Materialize CSS, Express, Mongoose
